item.title: Zabbix Agent2 on Ugreen Dxp2800
item.description: I recently got a new NAS, a UGreen DXP2800, and wanted to add it to me existing Zabbix Server to monitor disk space and get alerts when I was running low. I couldnâ€™t find much information about how to do this, so I wrote this for those who follow after. The Ugreen DXP 2800 Whilst you can mount in each network share into an existing machine that already has a Zabbix Agent running, I wanted to run the agent on the NAS itself - it is just a linux server, after all.
